Entry.EnglishText: Poplar

Entry.EnglishText: Rakia

Entry.JapaneseText: マルコ
Entry.EnglishText: Marco

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: スティーブ
Entry.EnglishText: Steve

Entry.JapaneseText: モニカ
Entry.EnglishText: Monica

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズの老剣士
Entry.EnglishText: Old Swordsman

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の子
Entry.EnglishText: Girl

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズ
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズ
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz

Entry.JapaneseText: 集会所
Entry.EnglishText: Meeting House

Entry.JapaneseText: 町の人たちが祈りを捧げている。
Entry.EnglishText: The townsfolk are all praying.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>ちゃん…… クレアちゃん……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, my Little <Veigue>... My Little Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア……
Entry.EnglishText: Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>ちゃん、ありがと。 おばさん、元気が出て来たわ。 あなたのおかげよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you, my Little <Veigue>. It's all thanks to you that I feel cheerful again.

Entry.JapaneseText: オレのほうこそ…… おばさんのピーチパイで救われたんだ。 ありがとう……
Entry.EnglishText: Same here... Your pies saved me... Thank you...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……また焼いてあげるからね。 楽しみにしててちょうだい。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I'll bake more some other time. You'd best look forward to it.

Entry.JapaneseText: それじゃあ、わたしは帰るわね。 <Veigue>ちゃん、皆さん、 本当にありがと♪
Entry.EnglishText: Well, I'll be headed home now. I'd like to extend my thanks to my Little <Veigue> and all his friends!♪

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、もう大丈夫だな？
Entry.EnglishText: Feeling better now, <Veigue>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ああ。 みんな、心配をかけてすまなかった。 ……いや……
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, I'm sorry for making you guys worry... No...

Entry.JapaneseText: 心配してくれて…… ありがとう。
Entry.EnglishText: I want to thank you all...for your concern.

Entry.JapaneseText: モニカ……やっと 元気になったな。
Entry.EnglishText: You look like you're in good spirits again, Monica.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>...

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアの友だちだっていう ガジュマのお嬢様のおかげだ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's all thanks to that Gajuma girl who said she was Claire's friend.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア……いまさらだけど、 もう一度謝らせて……
Entry.EnglishText: Claire... Even after all this time, I'd like to apologize once more.

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたがさらわれた時の事、 本当にごめんなさい……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm really sorry about getting you kidnapped...

Entry.JapaneseText: モニカ……あなたは悪くない。
Entry.EnglishText: Monica... It wasn't your fault.

Entry.JapaneseText: 悪いのは……悪いのは、 あなたや村の人たちに こんな思いをさせた…… 奴らよ……
Entry.EnglishText: The ones who should shoulder the blame...are those who put you and the other townsfolk through that...

Entry.JapaneseText: それに、終わってしまった事は、 もう元には戻せないけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Besides, what's done is done. The past cannot be changed.

Entry.JapaneseText: 大切なのは、その経験を これからの自分に活かす事 じゃないのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: What's important is that we make the most out of whatever life throws at us. Wouldn't you agree?

Entry.JapaneseText: う、うん…… クレア、ありがとう……
Entry.EnglishText: Y-You're right... Thank you, Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: ううん、私の方こそ、 モニカにつらい思いをさせて…… ごめんなさい。
Entry.EnglishText: Don't thank me. I ought to apologize as well for making you upset.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア……
Entry.EnglishText: Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱり、クレアはクレアだな！ でもってさ、<Veigue>…… これは俺からのお礼だ……
Entry.EnglishText: You haven't changed a bit, Claire! Oh by the way, <Veigue>, I want to give you a token of my appreciation...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なんて言うか……その…… おまえのおかげで、俺の気持ちが モニカに伝わったって言うか……
Entry.EnglishText: How do I say this... Well... It's all thanks to you that I was able to tell Monica how I really feel...

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、もう相変わらず おまえもおまえだな！ なんでもいいや、受け取ってくれ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hah, you haven't changed, either! Here, just take it.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一体、どうなっているんだ……？
Entry.EnglishText: What is he going on about...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……モニカ、よかったわね……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm happy for you, Monica.

Entry.JapaneseText: うん♪
Entry.EnglishText: Thanks! ♪

Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.Notes: DON'T EDIT THIS, IT'S A DUMMY ENTRY

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あの子…… ちょっとうらやましいな……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm somewhat jealous of her...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、ありがとな！
Entry.EnglishText: Thanks, <Veigue>!

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱり、おばさんのピーチパイは 最高だな！
Entry.EnglishText: Ms. Poplar's pies sure are the best!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、ありがとう！
Entry.EnglishText: Thanks, <Veigue>!

Entry.JapaneseText: こうやって、みんなが集まれるのって 素敵よね……
Entry.EnglishText: It's nice seeing everyone get together...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>ちゃん…… みんなとっても嬉しそうに 帰って行ったわ……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, Little <Veigue>... It looks like everyone had a great time...

Entry.JapaneseText: よかった……私…… もうみんなと仲良くなんて できないって思ってたから……
Entry.EnglishText: Thank goodness. I was worried that I'd never be able to make amends with everyone.

Entry.JapaneseText: 甘いものは好きじゃないけど、 これは別ね……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not one for sweets, but I can make an exception for these pies...

Entry.JapaneseText: ううーん、おれのパイと 何が違うんだろうな……
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm... Why don't <Italic>my</Italic> pies taste this good...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なつかしい味だった……
Entry.EnglishText: The taste sure brings back memories...

Entry.JapaneseText: わたしも感動してます……
Entry.EnglishText: What a moving experience...

Entry.JapaneseText: ホントにおいしかったよネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Those pies were really delicious!

Entry.JapaneseText: 突然、ガジュマどもが ヒューマに対して、 反感を抱き出したんじゃ。
Entry.EnglishText: Suddenly, the Gajuma have taken issue with Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: いつも仲良くしとったじいさんも、 冷たくあたりよる……
Entry.EnglishText: Even the other old man who I would always get along with is acting cold...

Entry.JapaneseText: ここでガジュマとヒューマの子らが 遊んでいた姿も久しく見んな……
Entry.EnglishText: And it's been a while since I've seen the Huma and Gajuma children play here together...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>…… いい子にしてるから…… 凍らせないでね？
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>... I've been a good kid, so please don't freeze me.

Entry.JapaneseText: 氷が解けたから、 集会所で遊べるようになったよー。
Entry.EnglishText: Now that the ice is melted, we can play in the Meeting House again~!

Entry.JapaneseText: 建物全体がすごく揺れたよ…… コワイよ……
Entry.EnglishText: The whole building was shaking... Scary...

Entry.JapaneseText: ここなら…… みつかりにくいよね？
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe this is a good hiding place?

Entry.JapaneseText: ここに……クレアが 閉じ込められてたの……？
Entry.EnglishText: So here...is where Claire was trapped...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ここにクレアってお姉ちゃんが、 氷の中に閉じ込められてたんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: This is where a girl named Claire was trapped in ice...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだか信じらんない……
Entry.EnglishText: It's hard to believe...

Entry.JapaneseText: またあの子と…… ここで遊べたらな……
Entry.EnglishText: I want to play with that other girl here again...

Entry.JapaneseText: かくれんぼしてたのに、 いきなりあの地鳴り……
Entry.EnglishText: We were playing Hide-and-Seek, when there was this huge tremor...

Entry.JapaneseText: コワかった……
Entry.EnglishText: Scary...

Entry.JapaneseText: しーっ！ かくれんぼしてるのよ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Shhhh! We're playing Hide-and-Seek...!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『集会所の壇上』 ここに立つと、集会所内全体を 見渡すことができる。
Entry.EnglishText: - Raised Stage - If you stand here, you can get a good look of the whole Meeting House.
